column13: Farlin Baby Shampoo (120 ml) Price: Rs.160

column1: Infants have delicate skin that is easily susceptible to infections and irritations. Therefore parents should be extra careful in choosing the products that are used on the baby’s skin. The Farlin Baby Shampoo is a body wash derived from infusing the goodness of various natural ingredients. This gentle and mild Baby Shampoo from Farlin is replete with the extracts of coconut oil. Coconut oil is an effective conditioner and helps the hair grow healthier with a lustrous shine.

This Farlin Baby shampoo is ideal for everyday use and it leaves your bundle of joy’s skin and hair soft and shiny. It is effective in cleansing the skin and hair of impurities and dirt that gets accumulated over a day.
